alert.note: Alert for Childress; Cottle (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 12:50AM CDT until June 10 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Childress County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northern Cottle County in northwestern Texas... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1249 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cee Vee, or 12 miles northwest of Paducah, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kirkland, Swearingen and Cee Vee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
